attributes.action: Restore faith in the office of House of Commons Speaker
attributes.background: John Bercow has brought the office of Speaker of the House of Commons into disrepute, presiding over a culture of bullying and taking sides in the Brexit debate. The House of Commons must urgently repair the damage and safeguard the constitution.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
